CustomField.description: Indicates the max amount of logs to be held within the Apex Logger before being published and flushed (I.e. cleared). A blank value or a value less than 1 results in immediate publishing of each log.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates the max amount of logs to be held within the Apex Logger before being published and flushed (I.e. cleared). A blank value or a value less than 1 results in immediate publishing of each log.
CustomField.label: Flush Limit
